code:
---
title: Easy Park Plus - Customer Account State Diagram (Security_IntrusionDetection)
---

stateDiagram-v2
    [Security_IntrusionDetection] --> Registered : Account created
    Registered --> Active : Email/identity verified
    Active --> Suspended : Policy violation or payment issue
    Active --> Deactivated : User-initiated or admin action
    Suspended --> Active : Issue resolved
    Suspended --> Deactivated : User or admin action
    Deactivated --> [Security_Encryption]
    note right of Suspended
        Account access is restricted
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 Security_IntrusionDetection 和 Security_IntrusionDetection 的分支。
收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'Security_IntrusionDetection 和 Security_IntrusionDetection'。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
